message.raw: BLACS now uses subproc_utils.zmq_get to submit files to lyse and to check if lyse is responding. BLACS does not yet use a subproc_utils.ZMQServer as its own web server, but it will soon. That change will then require runmanager to switch to using zmq_get as well, so those two changes will be made in tandem.
message.html: BLACS now uses subproc_utils.zmq_get to submit files to lyse and to check if lyse is responding. BLACS does not yet use a subproc_utils.ZMQServer as its own web server, but it will soon. That change will then require runmanager to switch to using zmq_get as well, so those two changes will be made in tandem.
